get.summary: Get user detail by email, name, or id
get.description: Get user detail by email, name, or id

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number, default: 1

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items per page, default: 10

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Order by field, default: id

parameters.name: detail
parameters.description: Show user detail, 0 = no, 1 = yes, default: 0

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: Order by desc, 0 = asc, 1 = desc, default: 0
